verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa dekhi' mahāprabhu dhāñā calilā
āge dekhi' hāsi' kṛṣṇa antardhāna ha-ilā

synonyms: kṛṣṇa dekhi'-seeing Kṛṣṇa; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhāñā calilā—began to run very swiftly; āge—ahead; dekhi'-seeing; hāsi'-smiling; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; antardhāna ha-ilā—disappeared.
translation: When He saw Kṛṣṇa, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began running very swiftly, but Kṛṣṇa smiled and disappeared.
